rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that doubles as a living area. The space is designed with natural light and ventilation in mind, following Vastu principles.
An elegantly planned dining room adjacent to the kitchen for efficient service.
A dedicated library/study area featuring built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating. It is positioned in a quiet corner as per Vastu guidelines.
A luxuriously designed master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom and closet, ensuring privacy and comfort.
Two guest bedrooms for visitors, each comfortably sized.
Two interconnected children rooms along with a designated play area to promote family interactions and energy flow in the household.
A modern kitchen designed for efficiency, integrated with pantry space. Vastu principles ensure proper layout placement relative to main living areas.

openings.description: The primary entry door, placed in the east as per Vastu.
Windows providing natural ventilation and daylight, aligning with traditional architectural practices.
